1. City Council

Weatherford City Council

City Council Regular Meetings are held on the second and fourth Tuesday of each month at 6 p.m. In July, November, and December, the schedule is adjusted for holidays and summer breaks. Each September, the City Manager presents a proposed meeting schedule for the upcoming fiscal year for Council adoption.

Click the following link to view the City Council agendas and minutes .

  • Paul Paschall, Mayor
  • Heidi Wilder, Council Member Place 1
  • Zack Smith, Mayor Pro Tem, Council Member Place 2
  • Matt Ticzkus, Council Member Place 3
  • Luke Williams, Council Member Place 4
  • The City Council consists of a Mayor and four Council Members.
  • The Mayor and Council Members are elected at-large by place, with all five representing the entire City of Weatherford
  • The Mayor and Council Members serve staggered terms of three years.
    • May 2, 2026 - Election for Places 1 and 2.
    • May 1, 2027 - Election for Places 3 and 4.
    • May 6, 2028 - Election for Mayor.
